name: Boss Fight (vincemckelvie)
description:
A classic boss fight scenario - 2 enter 1 leaves.

An unfinished generative FPS boss fight scenario created for the Game Jam!

You are a future Space Marine armed with a gunsword and jet pack. You are tasked with taking down the rogue Unit-A86 blaster robot at all costs. Use your blink ability, jetpack, gun and melee attacks to defeat Unit A-86!

CONTROLS

  • WASD: Movement
  • F: Pickup item
  • Mouse1: Shoot
  • Mouse2: Light Melee
  • E: Heavy Melee
  • Left Shift: Movement ability (jetpack or dash)

By Vince Mckelvie and Sam Newell

Song: KRON - Anthracnose

Note - Uses the free version of Invector Third Person Character Controller.
